name:
Every time I try to get something done in Shortcuts, I remember why I hate visual programming interfaces.

Shortcuts is very powerful, but absolutely maddening to use. Just give me a text editor and some docs please!

summary: @schneeks I heard that as well, and I am betting its true. I saw an analyst that said, on balance, he thinks that Red Bull will be ~0.3s faster per lap than Ferrari out of the gate, which would still be a strong start. I expect Ferrari will still be better in the slow corners, and Red Bull on the straights, which should lead to some serious battles depending on the circuit.My biggest concern at the moment is tire deg. Sounds like that may still be a challenge with the SF23.

content.html:
@schneeks I heard that as well, and I am betting its true. I saw an analyst that said, on balance, he thinks that Red Bull will be ~0.3s faster per lap than Ferrari out of the gate, which would still be a strong start. I expect Ferrari will still be better in the slow corners, and Red Bull on the straights, which should lead to some serious battles depending on the circuit.
My biggest concern at the moment is tire deg. Sounds like that may still be a challenge with the SF23.

I expect Ferrari will still be better in the slow corners, and Red Bull on the straights, which should lead to some serious battles depending on the circuit.My biggest concern at the moment is tire deg.
